[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Leads-Hero2021-2.jpg”][et_pb_fullwidth_header _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”100px||100px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”75px||75px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”25px||25px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Real Estate Leads

Market Leader offers two real estate leads products to help you reach your sales goals. One flat monthly rate buys you a minimum number of EXCLUSIVE buyer and seller leads in your desired areas every month.

Check Availability

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”You Buy ’em” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f4f4f4″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”padding: 1% 0 !important;”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/blue_exclusivity_icon_transparent_bg_v1.png” alt=”Exclusive real estate leads” title_text=”Exclusive real estate leads” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” height=”30px” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#111820″ text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Exclusive to You

We’ll never send your leads to your competitors[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/blue_quantity_icon_transparent_bg_v1.png” alt=”Guaranteed quantity of monthly leads” title_text=”Guaranteed quantity of monthly leads” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” height=”30px” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#111820″ text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Guaranteed Quantity

More than just market share—get the number of leads you paid for

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/blue_target_icon_transparent_bg_v1.png” alt=”Real estate agent lead marketing targeted to specific neighborhoods” title_text=”Real estate agent lead marketing targeted to specific neighborhoods” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” height=”30px” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#111820″ text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Target Specific Areas

Own your local market—get leads where you want them

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/blue_certificate_icon_transparent_bg_v1.png” alt=”A team of real estate experts work for you” title_text=”A team of real estate experts work for you” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” height=”30px” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#111820″ text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade”]

Experts Work for You

Save time & effort—leads are generated for you by digital advertising experts

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”off||” _builder_version=”3.22″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|100px||100px” custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”HouseValues Text” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font_size=”46px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

HouseValues

Capture prospective home sellers early—when they’re motivated & searching for a home valuation. Potential sellers visit HouseValues.com to request a free personalized home valuation. Their information—including property details and listing time frame—is then passed straight to you!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”30px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”]

Experience HouseValues leads:

  • Own your ZIP code, exclusively
  • Get seller lead insights including property details and listing timeframe
  • Receive a guaranteed number of leads per month
  • Leads are sent directly to the CRM for easy follow up
  • Send a personalized home valuation with Market Leader’s built in CMA tool

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/HouseValues_Screen-3.jpg” alt=”HouseValues.com provides buyer leads for real estate agents” title_text=”HouseValues.com provides buyer leads for real estate agents” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” animation=”left” sticky=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Leads Direct Text” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#0075C9″ header_2_font_size=”46px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” animation_style=”fade” use_border_color=”off”]

Leads Direct

Be the local expert. With Leads Direct, our pay-per-click advertising campaigns drive consumers who are searching for home listings on Google, Bing, and other search engines directly to your personally branded IDX website.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/screenshot2.png” alt=”Leads Direct uses pay-per-click advertising to generate quality real estate leads” title_text=”Leads Direct uses pay-per-click advertising to generate quality real estate leads” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” animation=”left” sticky=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on”] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”18px” header_3_font=”|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” animation_style=”fade” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Ensure a steady stream of leads with Leads Direct:

  • Capture home buyer and seller leads on your IDX website
  • Get lead insights including properties viewed
  • Only pay for leads, not visitors
  • Seamlessly integrated with Market Leader systems—all lead information, including home search criteria, is sent directly to your CRM

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#f2f9fe” custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Exclusive_Leads.png” alt=”What are exclusive leads?” title_text=”What are exclusive leads?” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#0075C9″ text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”1.8em” animation_style=”fade”]

Market Leader’s real estate leads are truly exclusive. Every lead we generate on your behalf will be sent to one and only one agent—you! Other companies send leads to multiple agents at the same time, so you must race to contact leads first. This is inconvenient and stressful for agents and irritating for consumers.
